room_title: Escape room "Old Tavern" by RiddleBox Escape Rooms in Chicago
room_description: Old Tavern escape room will take you back to medieval times. You are now a traveler who spent the night at this tavern. All that wine that you indulged in yesterday was laced with poison. Wicked tavern master will be back in one hour and now you have to race the time and search for the hidden antidote. To stand a chance and make it out alive, you will need to use all your senses. You will have to smell, listen and touch, in order to solve the mystery of the tavern and escape.
